conversation.content: I'm trying to use promotional code SAVE25 at checkout, but it's showing as invalid. This was sent to me yesterday.
Thank you for bringing this to my attention. Let me access your account and check the status of that promotional code. May I have your email address associated with the account?
It's michael.chen@stratosdigital.com. The email clearly states the code is valid through Sunday.

Perfect, I have your account pulled up. I can see you received our promotional email yesterday at 3:47 PM with code SAVE25 for our premium subscription upgrade. Let me verify why it's not applying correctly.
I need this resolved quickly. I'm presenting the upgraded features to my team this afternoon.
I understand the urgency. I've identified the issue - the code is specifically linked to annual billing plans, and you're currently attempting to apply it to a monthly subscription option.
The email doesn't mention that restriction anywhere. Can you point me to where that's stated?

You're absolutely right to question that. I'm reviewing the email template sent from our marketing system, reference ID MKT-8924-Q3, and I can confirm the billing restriction wasn't clearly communicated in yesterday's campaign.
So how do we resolve this? I need the discount you promised.
Certainly.
And I'm not interested in being locked into an annual plan when the terms weren't disclosed properly.
That's completely reasonable and I apologize for the confusion. I'm going to create a custom discount code that will apply to your monthly plan, matching the 25% savings you were expecting.
That works. When will I receive the new code?

I'm generating it right now. Your new promotional code is MCHEN-7251-SP and it's already active in our system. This code will provide 25% off your monthly premium subscription for the next six months.
Six months of the discount? That's better than the original offer.
Correct. Given the inconvenience and the miscommunication in our marketing email, I've extended the discount period as a courtesy. The code will automatically apply the savings through April 2024.
Perfect. I just applied it and it's working. Can you email me confirmation of these terms?
Absolutely. I'm sending a detailed confirmation to michael.chen@stratosdigital.com right now. You'll receive it within the next five minutes with reference number SUP-4082-MC for your records.
Excellent service. Thank you for resolving this professionally and quickly.

You're very welcome. I've also added a note to your account about this interaction and forwarded feedback to our marketing team about the unclear promotional terms. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

scenario: asking why their promotional discount code isn't working
